alert.note: Alert for Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with gusty winds will impact portions of central Kimball County through 415 PM MDT... At 339 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Oliver Reservoir, or near Kimball, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kimball, Dix, Oliver Campground, Oliver Reservoir and Kimball Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 10 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
